but who am I to tell you what's in your files...maybe it's not for some of =
us to hear...maybe its meant for you...am not trying to say what you say yo=
u hear you don't...because I'm not you...and that would be rude..just like =
most people well everyone except steve and tim can't hear my crossover...se=
e my point..

ear is true, would be to follow up with something that you got that actuall=
y happened.

heard, basically validating your experience?

-Steve
